problem_1.title: Unstructured CSV format
problem_1.details: Header rows mixed with metadata, Persian columns with extra spaces
problem_1.solution: Created CSVDataLoader with custom parser in src/data_loader.py

problem_2.title: Persian column names with whitespace
problem_2.details: UTF-8 encoding issues, inconsistent spacing in names
problem_2.solution: Implemented strip() and column mapping in CSVDataLoader

problem_3.title: Incomplete/invalid data
problem_3.details: Empty rows, zero values, inactive symbols, NaN values
problem_3.solution: Added filtering, validation, and dropna() in data pipeline

problem_4.title: No historical data (snapshot only)
problem_4.details: CSV contains only current prices, no 260-day history
problem_4.impact: Cannot calculate technical indicators or trends
problem_4.solution: Implemented synthetic 260-day data generation using price paths

problem_5.title: Static/non-real-time data
problem_5.impact: Not suitable for live trading signals
problem_5.solution: Created TSEConnector for real-time API data with caching

solution_1.name: Multi-source Data Loader
features: Parse unstructured CSV with proper encoding

solution_2.name: TSE API Integration
features: Direct connection to TSE market data

real_data_test.result: Generated valid OHLCV data for 30 TSE symbols

example_1.name: Simple CSV/Database
example_1.code:
from src.data_loader import HybridDataManager
hybrid = HybridDataManager()
data = hybrid.load_data(top_n=30)

example_2.name: With TSE API (live data)
example_2.code:
from src.tse_connector import CachedTSEConnector
tse = CachedTSEConnector()
data = tse.get_multiple_symbols(['نماد1', 'نماد2'], days=260)

example_3.name: Full Hybrid (recommended)
example_3.code:
from src.data_loader import HybridDataManager
hybrid = HybridDataManager()
data = hybrid.load_data(prefer_db=True)
from src.analyze import analyze_universe
signals, long_top, short_top = analyze_universe(data)

example_4.name: Database direct access
example_4.code:
from src.data_loader import SQLiteDataManager
db = SQLiteDataManager()
data = db.query_symbols(['نماد1', 'نماد2'])
history = db.query_price_history('نماد1', days=260)
